title: Xprim777
author: Xprim777
created_time: May 16, 2023, 11:15:23 AMLast edit: May 17, 2023, 08:02:15 PM by Xprim777
content: Hi, I would like to sell these 2 editions of The Times newspaper, January 3rd 2019.  At the bottom of the front page, you can read "Thanks Satoshi, we owe you one. Happy 10th Birthday, Bitcoin."I have The Times of London, and The Times Scotland. There are differences between these editions :On Scotland edition, the 2nd and 3rd page are dedicated to Bitcoin and how it works, the last page and the back are also Bitmex advertisments.On England edition, there is only the front page message, I didn't find any other bitcoin related content.Both newspapers are in good condition overall, they were folded in 2 but except this they are ok. Lot #1 : The Times of London  Lot #2 - The Times Scotland :  [/url]Starting bid per lot: 0.001 BTCMinimum bid increments per lot : 0.0001 BTC End time : Saturday 20th May 2023, 23h UTC+2 (Paris time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes before the auction end extend the auction for 10 minutes.Payment : 3AjBXvXLFu7mDgzeppd2XTBnucdxoZpgtCShipping : $10 worldwide with trackingEscrow accepted, winner pays fees.

comments.author: Xprim777
